body:
Hi Yu,


Try starting from here:


	http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/digests_html/v2n5.1.html#BRDF


Unfortunately, Radiance does not compute indirect lighting through  
BRDF materials except for the direct component.  I am working on a  
specialty program, similar to mkillum, to handle cases where a BSDF  
material covers a window or skylight opening, but that is months away  
from completion.


Best,
-Greg
